articles.author: Karishma Pranav Bhavsar
articles.title: BRICS Summit Day-2: PM Modi to hold bilateral meeting with South African President Cyril Ramaphosa | Mint - Mint
articles.description: On the second day of the 15th BRICS Summit, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday is scheduled to hold a bilateral meeting with South African President Cyril Ramaphosa.
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on 23 August is scheduled to hold a bilateral meeting with South African President Cyril Ramaphosa on the Day 2 of the 15th BRICS Summit. Then later in the day, the prime… [+3184 chars]
